product_overview: Life OS is an all-in-one personal productivity platform designed to streamline and unify habits, tasks, finances, academic tracking, journaling, and AI-powered assistance through a web application interface. It leverages modern technologies including React, TypeScript, Supabase, and AI to deliver an intuitive and efficient user experience.
core_goals: Provide a centralized dashboard consolidating critical daily information and tasks
Enable comprehensive habit tracking with insightful analytics and visualizations
Facilitate effective task management using Kanban boards and AI-enhanced quick capture
Offer detailed financial tracking with transaction analysis and AI-powered categorization
Support academic management through course tracking, grade calculation, and simulation tools
Incorporate AI assistance for insights, task creation, and data analysis
Motivate users via gamification features including points, levels, and badges
Provide journaling capabilities featuring mood tracking and daily reflections
Ensure responsive design for seamless use across devices
Maintain high accessibility standards and fast performance
key_features: 3-zone dashboard layout organizing Now, Today, and Context zones with dynamic widgets
Daily habit tracking including heatmaps, streak counters, and AI-powered insights
Kanban-style task management with drag-and-drop and Quick Capture with AI parsing
Financial management with transaction tables, charts, AI category suggestions, and summaries
University module with course cards, assignment tracker, grade calculator, and What-If simulator
AI Assistant accessible via chat interface and floating action button for insights and automation
Daily journaling system with mood tracking and reflection capabilities
Gamification mechanics featuring points, levels, streaks, and badges for user motivation
Focus Mode with a timer and distraction-free environment
Robust authentication and user session management via Supabase
user_flow_summary: Authentication flow with email/password login, signup, onboarding, and session persistence
Dashboard interaction with 3 zones displaying critical, daily, and contextual information
Habit management: viewing, creating/editing, marking completion with optimistic updates and visual feedback
Task workflows including Kanban board interaction, task creation/editing, drag-and-drop status updates, and AI-assisted Quick Capture input
Financial management: viewing transactions, adding entries with AI category suggestions, and analyzing data through charts and summaries
University academic flow: course viewing and management, assignment tracking, grading input, and What-If scenario simulations
AI Assistant interaction through a floating action button opening a chat interface capable of answering queries and suggesting actions
Journaling with daily entries and mood tracking
Responsive UI adapts to device breakpoints including mobile, tablet, and desktop
validation_criteria: Authentication mechanism securely authenticates users and manages sessions
Dashboard correctly renders all three zones with up-to-date data and interactive widgets
Habits can be created, edited, deleted, and marked complete with real-time UI updates
Tasks can be created, updated, deleted, reordered via drag-and-drop, and filtered effectively
Financial transactions input supports AI-based category suggestions and accurate data representation in summaries and charts
University courses and assignments can be managed accurately with correct grade calculations and simulator predictions
AI Assistant chat responds accurately and allows user confirmation on suggested actions
Journal entries are saved and displayed correctly with mood tracking functionality
Gamification features update points, levels, and badges according to user activity
UI is fully responsive and accessible following WCAG 2.1 Level AA guidelines
Performance targets are met for UI interaction, data operations, and AI response times
